page.title: 18Education in Charnwood
page.content: The Old School at Copt Oak is used as a YHA Hostel because all children attend schools elsewhere.There are no adult education classes at present previously they were held at Copt Oak Hall.The area receives TV well,Ceefax/ Oracle are available. The mobile library calls fortnightly. General Pamphlets are published by Leics CC also detailed notes on walks.Many other books about Charnwood Forest include this district.Most are obtainable from the library on loan or for purchase. There is no industry or trade many of the residents are retired couples or widows.Those still in gainful employment are employers or employees elsewhere or locally providing domestic help or work connected with the land.
